q: confirmed that it would be proper for the attorney general to obtain the views of ministers on the national interest before reaching his own independent decision. Ministers' views would be passed to the DPP and he would then exercise independent judgment, taking on board the serious considerations that have been given to the matter by other ministers and the attorney general. All this strikes me as perfectly proper. Before authorising the arrest and detention of a visiting politician such as Henry Kissinger or Donald Rumsfeld , the DPP would take into account any views expressed by William Hague or Liam Fox

Andy Coulson confirmed his resignation in a statement on Friday, saying that the continued coverage of events during his time as the editor of "News of the World' had made it difficult for him to give the 110 per cent needed in this role." I stand by what I've said about those events but when the spokesman needs a spokesman it"s time to move on," The Telegraph quoted him, as saying. Following

"One of the reasons this show stands out from the rest is that it's the only show where the contestants take an active role in deciding who's in the band," Simon Lythgoe said. Whereas contestants must sing in different genres on other shows, this is all about country music. Our contestants will turn some world-renowned songs from other genres like pop or Motown, pour their soul into it and make it country.
